publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4185 Shirley-Anne Somerville: Craig Gowans Memorial Trophy Challenge Charity Match—That the Parliament notes that the community football clubs of Hutchison Vale and Tynecastle are joining forces to play a charity challenge match for the Craig Gowans Memorial Trophy at 1 pm on Saturday 30 May 2009 in the Saughton Enclosure, Edinburgh; recognises that all proceeds of this match will go to the Children’s Hospice Association Scotland and the Edinburgh Royal Hospital for Sick Children; notes that the Craig Gowans Memorial Fund has raised thousands of pounds for charity while keeping alive the memory of this inspiring young former Hutchison Vale player; notes that many coaches and ex-players from both clubs have confirmed their participation, including Gary Mackay, Scott Crabbe, Mickey Weir and Darren Jackson; congratulates the organisers, and hopes that the event proves to be a great success.
S3M-4185 Craig Gowans Memorial Trophy Challenge Charity Match (lodged on 19 May 2009) Jamie Hepburn*, Dr Richard Simpson*
